venue.address_1: Intersection of Church Street & Elm Street
venue.name: New Haven Green (includes map)

item.description:
***Join us for the last free Concert on the Green in New Haven.  The artist is blues musician Robert Cray***

 

Meetup starts at 5:30pm to drink,mingle and to munch Concert starts at 6pm with the opening act and 7pm for Robert Cray New Haven Green  

 

* Donna is your host - "You can find us near/past the roped area on the right hand side.  I will have blocked off a space with blankets/chairs early in the day.  I will be wearing a long leopard print dress with a black top.  My cell # is 309-645-8539" 

 

The artist du jour is five-time Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter-guitarist Robert Cray  joined by long-time band members bassist Richard Cousins, keyboardist Jim Pugh and drummer Anthony Braunage, The Robert Cray Band will perform Cray’s hits and songs from the band’s studio album, “This Time.” Furious George is the 6 p.m. opening act.  

 

The venue is great because anything goes and there is much to see if you like to people watch.  The atmosphere is very relaxed and everyone is having a good time.  All are very enthused about the music.  There are all ages and all forms of dress - you cannot go wrong!   Parking is best on the side streets near the green such as Wall street and walking in.  

 

Bring yourself, a lawn chair or blanket, your favorite beverage, an appetizer to share and as many guests as you like - we want a party!  The music will be fantastic and hopefully the weather will cooperate.  I went to all of these concerts last year and had a great time!    Food and beverage vendors will be there on the fringe of the Green if you would like to purchase food there.  I heard there are also restaurants that will prepare a boxed meal to carry in as well.   

 

Come prepared to sit back and relax (or dance the night away), hear a wonderful blues talent and have a great night with friends old and new.
item.name: *** free concert on the green in New Haven with blues musician Robert Cray***
